name: Crosps
summary:
Crosps is an indie wasp shoot 'em up by David Bordicott from Blue Hood Games, where the crosshair is huge and the wasps are tiny.

With stupidly small wasps, and a cross hair filling the screen, precision and patience are a must have. And by God, you must have a lot of time to spare - although a simple concept, shooting the stupid wasps out of the air is bloody well impossible.
